nodes.text: Yanjon was one of the Four Sages of Dwartii, ancient controversial philosophers and lawgivers of the Galactic Republic. The other three Sages were Sistros, Braata, and Faya. Darth Plagueis owned a statue of Yanjon, which later passed into the hands of Darth Sidious.

In the now defunct MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, all four statues of the Sages of Dwartii could be collected. However, the statue that was labeled as Yanjon's in Galaxies was identified as Braata's effigy in the bronze statues set "Sistros and Braata" produced by Sideshow Collectibles. Leland Chee, administrator of the Holocron continuity database at Lucasfilm Ltd., has since commented that the Sideshow identification was correct and that the statue wearing a helmet was Braata's and not Yanjon's.
